name: Adventure Lands
description:
Instructions for my game: WASD is for movement. You can also use left up down right buttons for movement.  
 Use your mouse to control the camera,     there are no controls for picking up objects with my game. You just run into them to collect them.
 The player is a young teenage boy, who finds himself trapped in a TV show called adventure lands. The Adventure lands are filled with four different regions. The player needs to find five dolls to escape the adventure, lands, or else you’ll be trapped in the adventure Lands for eternity    The player is a young teenage boy, who finds himself trapped in a TV show called adventure lands. The Adventure lands are filled with four different regions. The player needs to find five dolls to escape the adventure lands, or else you’ll be trapped in the adventure Lands for eternity
